notes: Personal scope: List orders for authenticated user. Requires Authorization Bearer token. Token user_id must match buyer_user_id parameter.
Store scope: List orders for tenant. Requires X-Active-Tenant-Id header. Header UUID must match seller_tenant_id parameter.
Personal scope: List rentals for authenticated user. Requires Authorization Bearer token. Token user_id must match renter_user_id parameter.
Store scope: List rentals for tenant. Requires X-Active-Tenant-Id header. Header UUID must match provider_tenant_id parameter.
Personal scope: List reservations for authenticated user. Requires Authorization Bearer token. Token user_id must match requester_user_id parameter.
Store scope: List reservations for tenant. Requires X-Active-Tenant-Id header. Header UUID must match provider_tenant_id parameter.
Store scope: List listings for tenant. Requires X-Active-Tenant-Id header. Header UUID must match tenant_id parameter. Returns {data, meta} format.
